data.eml:eml: New species and new records of Cerambycidae (Insecta, Coleoptera) from RPPN Sanctuary of Caraça, Minas Gerais, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A. (2017): New species and new records of Cerambycidae (Insecta, Coleoptera) from RPPN Sanctuary of Caraça, Minas Gerais, Brazil. Zootaxa 4319 (2): 201-262, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4319.2.1
